questDescription->A [joiner_age]-year-old [joiner_title] named [joiner_nameDef] has deserted V.O.I.D. and is calling from nearby. [joiner_nameDef] expresses deep remorse for being a part of such an evil faction and tells you that [joiner_pronoun] is very sorry. [joiner_pronoun] seeks forgiveness by promising to help around your colony. [joiner_nameDef] is being followed by [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] of [enemyFaction_name]!

questDescription->A [joiner_age]-year-old [joiner_title] named [joiner_nameDef] is being hunted for deserting V.O.I.D.. [joiner_nameDef] explains that [joiner_pronoun] was forced to serve V.O.I.D. and expresses guilt for all of their wrongdoing. [joiner_nameDef] is pleading for your mercy, and cries that [joiner_pronoun] has nowhere else to turn. [joiner_pronoun] is being followed by [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] of [enemyFaction_name]!

questDescription->A [joiner_age]-year-old [joiner_title] named [joiner_nameDef] has gone rogue and decided to leave V.O.I.D.. [joiner_nameDef] tells you that [joiner_pronoun] was kidnapped, offered unimaginable riches and had their organs and limbs replaced in exchange for obedience. After having seen a child transformed into a monster, [joiner_nameDef] has decided to go on the run and vows to help you fight V.O.I.D.. [joiner_pronoun] is being followed by [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] of [enemyFaction_name]!

questDescription->A [joiner_age]-year-old [joiner_title] named [joiner_nameDef] is overcome by guilt and chose to desert V.O.I.D.. [joiner_nameDef] cries that [joiner_pronoun] can no longer bear to help V.O.I.D. and would rather die a horrible death than carry on this evil path. [joiner_pronoun] pleads for your compassion and promises to offer you their life and loyalty in exchange. [joiner_pronoun] is being followed by [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] of [enemyFaction_name]!

questDescription->A [joiner_age]-year-old [joiner_title] named [joiner_nameDef] claims to have left V.O.I.D. and seeks your help. [joiner_nameDef] says [joiner_pronoun] made an irrevocable mistake by taking part in the abominable works of such a wicked organization and wishes [joiner_pronoun] had never been born at all. [joiner_pronoun] expresses much regret and promises to help set things right if you give them a second chance. [joiner_pronoun] is being followed by [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] of [enemyFaction_name]!
